DataElement.preferredName: Accelerated Partial Breast Radiation Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No indicator to signify Accelerated Partial Breast Irradiation (APBI) eligible as per American Society of therapeutic radiation Oncology (ASTRO) criteria.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Accelerated Partial Breast Radiation Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Accelerated Partial Breast Irradiation (APBI) eligible as per American Society of therapeutic radiation Oncology (ASTRO) criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Partial; being or affecting only a part; not total:One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.:Radiation treatment in which the total dose of radiation is given over a shorter period of time (fewer days) compared to standard radiation therapy.

Concepts.definition: Being or affecting only a part of something.
One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.
Radiation treatment in which the total dose of radiation is given over a shorter period of time (fewer days) compared to standard radiation therapy.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

Concepts.definition: The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Subject is eligible for Accel
ReferenceDocuments.description: Subject is eligible for Accelerated Partial Breast Irradiation (APBI) based on American Society of therapeutic radiation Oncology (ASTRO) criteria.
